rooms.name: Veils of Fear
rooms.effect: Each player loses 2 life unless they discard a card.

rooms.name: Sandfall Cell
rooms.effect: Each player loses 2 life unless they sacrifice a creature, artifact, or land.

rooms.name: Oubliette
rooms.effect: Discard a card and sacrifice a creature, an artifact, and a land.

rooms.name: Cradle of the Death God
rooms.effect: Create The Atropal, a legendary 4/4 black God Horror creature token with deathtouch.
